code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/naveen/Desktop/Application/cartofgifts/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{db}from"../api/firebase";import{ref,onValue}from"firebase/database";export const subscribeGifts=callback=>{const giftsRef=ref(db,"gifts");return onValue(giftsRef,snapshot=>{const data=snapshot.val()||{};const giftArray=Object.keys(data).map(key=>_objectSpread({id:key},data[key]));callback(giftArray);});};
